## E2E data test
Emails on {user}@example.com, password as test{user}. The name describe the role (parent-parent, champion-champion of a dojo (often the same number), etc.
### users.json
* parent1
  * child1 - u13
  * child2 - o13  (w/ pwd "imakitten")
* parent2
  * child3 - o13 (w/o pwd)
* mentor[1-2]
* champion[1-6]
  * 1-2 have a dojo
  * 3-6 have a lead
